title: Font with c that looks like a horseshoe
content:
Trying to id the font in the header that reads "Chattanooga Cheesecake" - It has the c that looks somewhat like a horseshoe...

[http://chattanoogacheesecake.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315225552/http:/chattanoogacheesecake.com/ "http://chattanoogacheesecake.com/")

Thanks in advance.
